tool_description: Updates inventory levels and item status when return shipments are confirmed as delivered to processing facilities.

items.description: Array of item SKUs being returned

warehouse_location.description: Warehouse or facility code where items were delivered

condition_status.description: Condition of returned items (new, used, damaged, defective)

update_type.description: Type of inventory update (received, quarantine, restockable)

inspection_required.description: Whether items require inspection before restocking

error_messages: Return ID not found: The specified return_id does not exist in the system.
Items and quantities mismatch: The items and quantities arrays must have the same length.
Invalid warehouse location: The warehouse_location code is not recognized in the system.
Invalid condition status: Use one of [new, used, damaged, defective] for condition_status values.
Invalid update type: Use one of [received, quarantine, restockable] for update_type.
Inventory update failed: Unable to update inventory due to system constraints or item locks.
usage: Provide return_id, items, quantities, and warehouse_location, optionally specify condition_status, update_type, and inspection_required.

update_successful.description: Whether the inventory update was successful

updated_items.description: List of successfully updated item SKUs

failed_items.description: List of items that failed to update

new_inventory_levels.description: Updated inventory quantities for each item
